titleStmt.title: The resolvtion of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament to the Kings most excellent maiestie concerning the great disturbances in York-shire with the humble propositions and desires of the gentry, free-holders, and inhabitants of the county of York-shire to both Houses of Parliament : likewise terrible newes from Holland, read in the House of Commons and ordered to be forthwith printed.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
